name: Oworkers
tagline: Data Entry & Processing Services - GDPR compliant
description:
OUTSOURCE TYPING / TRANSFORMATION / ENRICHMENT / CATEGORIZATION & VALIDATION OF YOUR DATA IN A SECURE, ECONOMICAL, FAST & SCALABLE WAY.
 
Our company is a BPO company (Business Process Outsourcing) 100 % specialized (pure player) in MULTILINGUAL data & content back office operations focus on 4 core expertises: 
 
DATA ENTRY SERVICES 
 
On invoices
On catalog products
On contacts database
On very specific industry documents : KYC, insurance claims, medical bills...
On large texts & books
 
DATA PROCESSING SERVICES
 
AI (artificial intelligence) images or set of data validation
On Civils registrars (cutting, re-typing, indexation)
XML processing,
BIG DATA validation
 
CONTENT MODERATION SERVICES
 
UGC
Social networks moderation
 
AUDIO & VIDEO TRANSCRIPTION SERVICES VERBATIM QUALITY  
 
We are GDPR compliant with strong security processes for processing your data.
 
Our commercial office is in Europe and we have multiple delivery centers around the world with more than 200 employees :
 
Bulgaria (Plovdiv)
Egypt (Cairo) 
Madagascar (Antananarivo).
 
We deliver in 6 languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish & Portuguese.
READ MORE...
